message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $115. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to go up to $112. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $118?
I'm getting close, but I think I can get it even better. How about $114?
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I can do $116, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Take it or leave it!
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I think I can get it even better. How about $114.50?
I've reached my limit, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $117. This is my final offer. Take it or walk away!
I'm sorry, Alice, but I think I've gone as low as I can. I'm going to have to pass on this offer. I'll consider buying from John for $150 instead.
